cita#H stha pariqcita# Ud^^rdhvaqcita#H SrayaddhvaqM tayA#

A pyA#yasvaq samE#tu tE viqSvata#H sOmaq vRuShNi#yaM | 
BavAq vAja#sya sa~ggaqthE || 
saM tEq payA(gm)#siq samu# yantuq vAjAqH saM ~MvRuShNi#yA-nyaBimAtiqShAha#H | 
AqpyAya#mAnO aqmRutA#ya sOma diqvi SravA(gg)#syuttaqmAni# dhiShva || 32
(A - manda#sva - sAnaqsi - mEkAqnnaca#tvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A7)
